tgt_original: nityaṃ ca guravedeyaṃ tasmād buddha (tva) samo guruḥ |
yathā vairocano nāthastathā vajradharo guruḥ ||  yathākāśo mahārā (gaṃ)  jo vajradharmo mahāmuniḥ |
samantarājo yathā nāthastathācāryaḥ pragīyate ||  tasmātsarvaprayatnena vajrācārya mahāgurum |  pracchannavarakānyāsaṃ nāvamanyāt kadācana ||  punarapyuktaṃ vajrapañjare
gurośchāyāṃ na laṅghayed [guru] patnīṃ ca pādukā [m] |
ye laṅghayanti sammohāt te narāḥ kṣuradhāriṇaḥ ||
sva (su) siddho'pi yadā śiṣyo gurorājñāṃ na (tu) laṅghayet |
